directions: Pour the corn into a saucepan, and boil over high heat until hot. Drain well, and return to the saucepan. Stir in the butter, mayonnaise, and cotija cheese. Season to taste with ground red pepper and lime juice. Spoon into a serving dish, and garnish with a sprig of cilantro to serve.
ingredients: 2 (15.25 ounce) cans whole kernel corn, undrained
1 pinch ground red pepper to taste
2 tablespoons lime juice, or to taste
title: Mexican Street Vendor Style Corn Salad
